personal.name: Hermes Pérez
personal.title: Tech Lead | Senior Full Stack Developer | Computer Engineer

summary: Computer Engineer with over 8 years of experience leading high-performance teams and developing scalable software solutions. Specialist in modern architectures (React, Node.js, Next.js) with extensive experience as Tech Lead and Technology Director. Expert in optimizing the software development lifecycle (SDLC), implementing automated testing (Jest), and leading technical transformation in agile environments. Focused on delivering high-quality technical products and strategic alignment with business objectives.

experience.description: Technical leadership of complex projects using React, Node.js and cloud architectures.
highlights: Technical leadership of complex projects using React, Node.js and cloud architectures
Mentoring development teams and making decisions about infrastructure and technology stack
Workflow optimization through CI/CD and comprehensive code reviews

experience.position: Front-End Tech Lead / Director / Tech Lead
experience.description: Constant evolution from Tech Lead to Area Director, managing IT strategy and department KPIs.
highlights: Constant evolution from Tech Lead to Area Director, managing IT strategy and department KPIs
Front-End architecture definition for multiple projects using Next.js, TypeScript and Angular
Implementation of Unit Testing methodologies (Jest) to ensure software stability
Technical negotiation with stakeholders and infrastructure budget management in GCP and Amazon CloudFront

experience.description: Comprehensive application development using Functional Programming and microservices architectures.
highlights: Comprehensive application development using Functional Programming and microservices architectures
NoSQL database management and software infrastructure optimization

experience.description: Development of advanced user interfaces with React.js and GraphQL.
highlights: Development of advanced user interfaces with React.js and GraphQL
Ensuring cross-browser compatibility and performance optimization (SEO/PWA)

experience.description: Development of robust applications using JavaScript, PHP (Laravel) and PostgreSQL.
highlights: Development of robust applications using JavaScript, PHP (Laravel) and PostgreSQL
Implementation of MVC design patterns and deployment of scalable solutions for various sectors
